books.author: by Anderson Cooper and Gloria Vanderbilt
books.description: Mother and son discuss their relationship and difficult family history.
books.name: THE RAINBOW COMES AND GOES

books.author: by Arianna Huffington
books.description: What scientific research reveals about the dangers of sleep deprivation, and tips for achieving better sleep habits. By the founder of The Huffington Post.
books.name: THE SLEEP REVOLUTION

books.author: by Paul Kalanithi
books.description: A memoir by a physician who received a diagnosis of Stage IV lung cancer at the age of 36.
books.name: WHEN BREATH BECOMES AIR

books.author: by Phil Knight
books.description: A memoir by the founder of Nike.
books.name: SHOE DOG

books.author: by Ron Chernow
books.description: A biography of the first Treasury secretary, a major author of the Federalist Papers and an advocate of strong central government. Originally published in 2004 and the basis of the Broadway musical.
books.name: ALEXANDER HAMILTON

books.author: by Daniel James Brown
books.description: The University of Washington’s eight-oar crew and their quest for gold at the 1936 Berlin Olympics.
books.name: THE BOYS IN THE BOAT

books.author: by Erik Larson
books.description: The last voyage of the Lusitania, the passenger liner sunk by a German torpedo in 1915; by the author of “The Devil in the White City.”
books.name: DEAD WAKE

books.author: by Steve Case
books.description: In the current era, entrepreneurs will use technology to revolutionize various sectors of the economy.
books.name: THE THIRD WAVE

books.author: by Ashlee Vance
books.description: A technology writer follows Musk’s life from his difficult South African childhood to his involvement in Internet start-ups like the rocket company SpaceX and the electric-car company Tesla.
books.name: ELON MUSK

books.author: by Michael Kinsley
books.description: Essays, both serious and humorous, about aging and death, based in part on Kinsley’s experience with Parkinson’s disease and aimed at his fellow baby boomers.
books.name: OLD AGE

books.author: by Hope Jahren
books.description: A geobiologist shares her fascination with plants and describes how she found her vocation.
books.name: LAB GIRL

books.author: by Ta-Nehisi Coates
books.description: A meditation on race in America by The Atlantic's national correspondent; a National Book Award winner.
books.name: BETWEEN THE WORLD AND ME

books.author: by Charles Duhigg
books.description: The science of productivity, from the author of “The Power of Habit.”
books.name: SMARTER FASTER BETTER

books.author: by Kate Andersen Brower
books.description: The 10 first ladies since 1960, based on interviews with White House staff, social secretaries and friends.
books.name: FIRST WOMEN
